data.title: Here’s Everything New to Disney+ in April 2021
data.meta_description: Here's everything coming to Disney+ in April 2021, including The Falcon and the Winter Soldier finale and Star Wars: Clone Wars.
data.text:
If you’re looking for new movies and TV shows to watch on Disney Plus, you’ve come to the right place. The family friendly streaming service is adding a bevy of titles throughout the month of April, ranging from new episodes of exciting new original series to library titles from Disney’s back catalogue.

A couple of the most exciting library additions are related to Star Wars, as Disney+ will finally make animation legend Genndy Tartakovsky’s original animated Clone Wars series available to stream for the first time. Ditto two seasons of something called Star Wars: Ewoks, an animated series from the 1980s. There’s even a segment from the infamous Star Wars Holiday Special being added to Disney+ this month.

The ongoing adventures of The Falcon and the Winter Soldier continue weekly on Fridays, building to the season finale on April 23rd. Just as with WandaVision, that finale will be followed by a behind-the-scenes documentary that delves into the making of the Marvel Studios series called Assembled: The Falcon and the Winter Soldier.

RELATED: Here's How Much of That 'Falcon and the Winter Soldier' Episode 2 Therapy Scene Was Improv

There’s also new episodes of The Mighty Ducks: Game Changers, a continuation of the beloved franchise that puts Lauren Graham front and center as the coach of a new underdog hockey team while Emilio Estevez reprises his role as Gordon Bombay.

And in terms of library movies, there’s Blue Sky Animation’s 2011 film Rio, which singlehandedly cancelled a Pixar movie with a similar plot, and the fantastic 2019 family fantasy film The Kid Who Would Be King. And there’s also director Gore Verbinski’s underrated action epic The Lone Ranger, which arrives at the end of the month and unfortunately carries with it some significant baggage related to its two main leads.

Check out the full list of everything new to Disney+ in April below.

Available April 2
